page.title: 19A DAY IN THE LIFE OF LISA.
page.content: A typical day for me would be to get up at 7.30 a.m. and go down for breakfast which consists of cereal, toast and a cup of tea. After I have washed and dressed it is usually 8.15 a.m. We start out for school at 8.30 a.m. School starts at 9.00 a.m. Sometimes we have an assembly held by one of the teachers or their class. Some of the subjects we do at school are maths, english, study, R.E., arithmetic and creative writing. School finishes at 3.30 p.m. Some days there are after school activities for example, gymnastics, netball, running, rounders, cricket and swimming. When I come home from school I change into shorts or trousers and go out to play with Catherine and other friends. One game that we enjoy playing is rounders.
